statements: UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status = true WHERE report_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET date = '2022-12-31', location = 'Site 2' WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status = TRUE, location = 'New York' WHERE report_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET inspector_name = 'John Doe', compliance_status = FALSE, date = '2022-07-15' WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status='Compliant' WHERE report_id=101;
UPDATE inspection_details SET inspector_notes='Needs improvement' WHERE detail_id=201;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status='Compliant', inspector_name='John Doe' WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE inspection_details SET inspector_notes='Site is clean and well-maintained', inspection_date='2022-09-15' WHERE detail_id=2;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET inspector_name='John Doe', compliance_status=false, inspection_date='2022-09-15' WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE inspection_findings SET finding_description='Leakage detected in North corner', severity_level='Critical' WHERE finding_id=3;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET inspector_name='John Doe', compliance_status=TRUE WHERE report_id=101;
UPDATE inspection_photos SET photo_url='http://example.com/photo1.jpg' WHERE photo_id=201;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status = 'Pending' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE landfill_locations SET city = 'New York' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_status = 'Non-compliant' WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE inspection_findings SET severity_level = 'High' WHERE report_id = 1002;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_score = 90.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE landfill_sites SET site_capacity = 5000.00, site_owner = 'ABC Corporation' WHERE site_id = 3;
UPDATE landfill_inspection_reports SET compliance_score = 80 WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE landfill_sites SET site_owner = 'ABC Corp.', site_capacity = 1500.50 WHERE site_id = 1;
